betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§6Gerald the Construction Android§r is the most powerful weapon in the mod. Using this has the side effect of setting the world on fire but also getting tektite, which contains §6Osmiridium§r.

Gerald is the hardest recipe of the mod requiring hundreds of thousands of items, mainly circuit related.

Vast quantities of §6Bismuth§r, §6Tantalium§r and §6Silicon§r are needed, so dont hold back on bedrock ore processing and parallelisation of many processes. If you havent already used §dAE2§r, it is highly recommended at this stage of the game.

Launching Gerald will result in a global firestorm that will decimate all life, including all trees and grass. Make sure to keep a backup of your world before launching him.

§2Blueprints for Gerald and the Orbital Module can be found in structures or purchased from Bobmazon.
